guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Batteries, AA
  • Piezo buzzer
  • Hookup wire, solid core
  • Tactile switch
Tools
  • Needle Nose Pliers
  • Solder, lead-free
  • Soldering iron
  • Wire cutter/stripper

lines.text: Remove the back cap from the whiteboard marker using your pliers. You may need to use a handy trick i use with lots of things when they are wedged in somewhere; put some ice or cold water on the inside part that is stuck, and heat up the outside part that is around the smaller part.
